message_catalog.msg: A member of the %system_name% community since
Your account at %system_name% has been closed.
message_catalog.description:
Description please - does this refer to 'Close account' on the 'Your(/My) Account' page? Where ist the user taken if he doesn't confirm? On the 'MySpace' page? (pvt=private?)
--Anja Wicht
message_catalog.msg:
Your account is currently closed.

If you wish, we can reopen your account.
Your account is currently closed. Log in again to see what you can do about it.
This account is not available at this time.
Your account at %system_name% has been reopened. Welcome back.
Retrieving password from local authority is not supported.
You have (or someone impersonating you has) requested to change your system password. To complete the change, visit the following link:
If you are not the person who made this request, you don't need to take any action.

Pick the questionnaire that will be displayed to new users.
It can be used to perform automated actions (e.g. add users to specific groups, notify specific people about new registrations, etc.).

Please confirm that you would like to close your account at %system_name%.

Closing your account means that we will no longer send you email notifications, nor will you show up in lists of members at %system_name%. Your contributions to the community, however, will be preserved, as they're part of the community's history.

Note that you may reopen your account at any time, simply by logging in again.
You have successfully chosen a new password.
Create a new custom registration questionnaire
Your online status is currently not visible to other users.
Your online status is currently visible to other users.

If you need this functionality, please load acs-reference and ref-countries.
It would be a very bad idea to choose this option if you're using a shared computer in a library or school. Any subsequent user of this machine would be able to masquerade as you on our service.

Note text in red below the parameter entry fields indicates the value of this parameter is being overridden by an entry in the OpenACS parameter file. The use of the parameter file is discouraged but some sites need it to provide instance-specific values for parameters independent of the apm_parameter tables.
Note that you can erase your saved email address and password by choosing the "log out" option from your workspace.

Our server can tell your browser to remember certain things, such as your email address and password. This is convenient for you because, if you're the only person who uses your computer, you won't have to keep telling us your email address and password.
Please locate your country's code among those listed below then use the "back" button on your browser to return to the previous form.
Please read and follow the instructions in this email.
Please try to log in again
Privileges higher in the hierarchy imply all the privileges below, e.g. when you grant admin, then read, write etc. are implied automatically.

3. Choose "%password_update_link_text%"
Your password must be changed regularly. Please change your password now.
